project.name: nme-tiled
project.description: nme-tiled is a library, which gives NME developers the possibility to use the TILED Map Editor.
project.version: Added new static factory methods to TiledMap and removed the standard constructor (So please use the new TiledMap.fromAssets and TiledMap.fromGenericXml methods! Thanks!), Added a toCSV method to Layer for the upcomming HaxeFlixel support and made ObjectGroup iterable.
